meanings.definition: A greeting or salutation, especially in Islamic culture.
meanings.sent1: He greeted his friend with a warm salaam.
meanings.sent2: The salaam exchanged between them showed mutual respect.
meanings.sent3: The cat gave a salaam to the dog, surprising everyone.
meanings.sent4: The salaam of the rising sun brought hope to the village.
meanings.sent5: Her salaam was so cheerful that it brightened up the room.

meanings.sent1: The garden was a place of quiet salaam.
meanings.sent2: After the storm passed, a sense of salaam filled the air.
meanings.sent3: The salaam of the sleeping baby was contagious, calming all around.
meanings.sent4: In the salaam of the forest, he found solace for his troubled mind.
meanings.sent5: The old tree exuded a sense of salaam that soothed the weary travelers.
